links.*: Sir Gawain and the Green Knight, Pearl and Sir Orfeo

wikitext.*:
'''Pearl''' is a [[Wikipedia:Pearl (poem)|Middle English manuscript]]. It can also refer to: 

*''[[Sir Gawain and the Green Knight, Pearl and Sir Orfeo]]'', a collection of three poems translated by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]]
**'''''[[Pearl]]''''', the Middle English poem as translated by J.R.R. Tolkien
*''[[Pearl (E.V. Gordon)|Pearl]]'', edited by [[E.V. Gordon]], including a written contribution by J.R.R. Tolkien
* [[Pearl and Sir Orfeo (audiobook)|''Pearl and Sir Orfeo'' (audiobook)]]
* [[Pearl Took]]
* [[Nimphelos]], a great pearl belonging to [[Elwë]]
